item.title: Spaniard Santiago Sánchez Trekking to Qatar for FIFA World Cup 2022 Reported Missing in Iran
item.description: Spaniard Santiago Sánchez Trekking to Qatar for FIFA World Cup 2022 Reported Missing in Iran Sánchez's reported disappearance in Iran, his last stop before reaching Qatar for the World Cup, comes as protesters rise up across the Islamic Republic in the largest antigovernment movement in over a decade

item.title: Newly married teacher found dead
item.description: Newly married teacher found dead A 25-year-old newly married private school teacher was found dead under mysterious circumstances at her apartment in Puttenahalli on Saturday.

item.title: Gujarat: PM Narendra Modi’s meet with Patidar leader sets tongues wagging
item.description: Gujarat: PM Narendra Modi’s meet with Patidar leader sets tongues wagging Ahmedabad: Amid speculation that Prime Minister Narendra Modi may visit influential Patidar organisations on Sardar Patel’s birth anniversary on October 31 in a renewed bid to win over the community, Naresh Patel, Chairman of the Shree Khodaldham Trust, met him at his residence in New Delhi on Saturday evening.
